I agree with that 200% when I mentioned a haunted location i was because of=
 the experience not because I feel it's the onbly source.
  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: black bear hollow 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Thursday, November 27, 2008 9:59 AM
  Subject: Re: About: Re: [EVP-IT=
C]Re: insulted by the spirits


  We simply never know with who or what we =
are talking to. There are millions of types of energies. Not all was human.=
 Could be anything and if it has the intelligence to communicate & modulate=
 so we can hear it in our dimension with our human/mortal ears, it will. "T=
hey" are everywhere, not just in so called "haunted" locations. 



  w.

 =
 On Nov 27, 2008, at 7:25 AM, Andrea Carr wrote:


    That could be a poss=
ibilty but also remember if you were an a-hole in life it's not going to ch=
ange because you pass over. I had a haunting in NH where this was very much=
 the case.

    Also there are variables like entities from the lower plane=
s that can come through when recording, vortex's that might allow opportuni=
ties to go from the other side to here, alien contact or maybe simple inter=
fences.
